column2: Colony
[Location.TOW_GetColonyProgress]

There is a colony developing in this province. It grows progressively but is exposed to incidents and exterior attacks. If not interrupted or destroyed, it will eventually establish itself as a new holding. DEBUG PROGRESS : [Location.TOW_colony_progress.GetValue]
Creeps : [Location.TOW_creep_level.GetValue]

Gnolls : [Location.TOW_creep_level_gnoll.GetValue]
Has Abandoned a Colony
This character has abandoned the development of a colony, angering the people who worked hard there. This is truly not the way of a caring ruler.

Bustling Colony
A new colony has been founded in [From.GetName]. Plenty of people are motivated to build settlements in its [From.GetLocationTerrain]. We hope to see it flourish and prosper.
The colony situated in [From.GetName] developed into a castle.
The colony situated in [From.GetName] developed into a city.

The colony situated in [From.GetName] developed into a church.

Our colony in [From.GetName] was unfortunately unsustainable and was abandoned. Maybe this was too ambitious...

A builder made a terrible mistake that made an entire house collapse in the colony of [From.Location.GetName]!
The [From.Location.TOW_GetRandomWeightedCreeps]s in [From.Location.GetName] attacked our colony!
An influx of workers, merchants and builders was heading towards our colony in [From.GetName]! This will surely increase the expansion of the colony there.

Abandon Colony
Abandon the colony in the §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!, stopping its development entirely and leaving it into the hands of neighbouring creatures. This will anger the people of our realm.
